channel.description:

Website: [url=http://drygonscape.revalhost.net]DrygonScape Forums[/url]

[#1] - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TLEaCRx-LXY]718/742 DrygonScape. TheRiseOfZark Quest. [RSPS] [1080p] - YouTube[/url] Webclient: [url=http://drygonscape.revalhost.net/webclient.html]DrygonScape 718 - Providing every unique experience![/url] You Do NOT need to Register to Play!!
Home of Drygonscape [IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/6812/nnva.png[/img] The Quest tab to Teleport into the game and more [IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/4540/sn2u.png[/img] The Adventures Log [IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/2448/vbtf.png[/img] Teleports into the game [IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/6139/qgmu.png[/img] Prestige System [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/8196/8gp6.png[/img] Commands List [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/7816/exkg.png[/img] Completionist Cape Requirements [IMG]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/1581/04zh.png[/img] Loyalty Shop [IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/4624/7sfn.png[/img] Vote Shop [IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/6743/b6ts.png[/img] Miscellaneous [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/6404/7eks.png[/img] Magic Shop [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/834/403t.png[/img] Armoury Shop [IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/5545/muin.png[/img] Dry Points Shop [IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/3279/nz5p.png[/img] Forums of Drygonscape [IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/7500/ve6q.png[/img]
Features - ClanChat - Duel Arena - Dungeoneering System - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - 4 different Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - All skills trainable! - Summoning - 100% working leeches - Working Korasi’s Sword & others such as D claws. - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Yell with custom colours! - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their effects - Working Teleblock - Staff of light Special - Daily Events! - Player run economy! - Player's get to vote updates! - Unique Adventures Log - Unique Dry Point system - Nice xp rates! - Choose your own XP! - Unique Quests - Tones of Completionist cape requirements! - 10 Prestige levels! With awesome rewards! - Loyalty point system! - 10 Digit bank pins! Anti-hax! - DDoS Protected VPS! - 3 second character saving. Prevent rollbacks! - Custom character clothing saving! - Unique home, never seen before! - All bosses! - 3 different types of dwarf cannon! - Dominion tower! - Lot's of pvp action! - Castle wars/clans wars! - Dicing for trusted ranks! - Fight Caves/Kiln - Money Pouch - Nex - GWD Bosses - Dryaxions - TheRiseOfZark - Highscores - Vote4Items - Duel Arena - LRC - Vote Store - Wildy Wyrm
And so much more...!
Come join us! Don't waste your time finding the right server anyway more. It's right here!!
